title: Advanced Nutrition Education Course for Pharmacy Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A problem-based learning and case-centered educational environment using digital devices, emphasizing practical skills to apply nutritional knowledge during patient consultations

learning_goals: Learners can explain nutrient-disease interactions (e.g., diabetes, cardiovascular diseases) and propose relevant dietary guidelines
Learners can analyze drug-nutrient interactions and provide appropriate dietary advice to patients
Learners can interpret nutrition labels and food composition tables to suggest clinical applications of functional foods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
